title: Noam Chomsky on the Ali G Interview
description:
Noam Chomsky was recently interviewed by Swagat Baruah, Founder and Managing Editor of Catharsis Magazine. Chomsky talks about his disastrous interview with Ali-G.

Q: What about the Ali G (Sacha Baron Cohen) interview? You were visibly awkward throughout the interview.

For the full interview and transcript, visit Catharsis Magazine (link below)

https://catharsismagazine.com/2018/04...

Support us on our Patreon page by becoming a patron for as less as $50 per month! We are the first Indian student magazine to have interviewed Noam Chomsky.
